ref.div: Herres-Pawlis S, Hoffmann A, Grunzke R, Nagel WE, De La Garza L, Krüger J, Terstyansky G, Weingarten N, Gesing S (2014) Meta-metaworkflows for combining quantum chemistry and molecular dynamics in the MoSGrid science gateway.
